Function reference

All functions

ageadjust()
Calculate the age standardized rate using the direct method.
asr_rate()
Compute age standardized rate based on provided standard population
calc_age()
Calculate the actual age between two dates
check_id()
Check if the Chinese ID number complies with the GB 11643-1999 standard.
check_topo()
Verify if the topographic site codes for ICDO3 comply with the ICDO3 coding rules.
classify_childhood()
Classify the Childhood cancer into ICCC3
classify_icd10()
Convert ICD10 Codes to Cancer Categories.
clean_canreg()
Clean canreg data.
count_canreg()
Count the canreg data.
create_age_rate()
Create age specific rate.
create_map()
Create map.
create_quality()
Create quality index from object of class 'fbswicd'.
cutage()
Cut age into groups.
dulbar_chart()
Plot dual bar chart.
dumbbell_chart()
Plot dumbbell chart.
expand_age_pop()
Expand age groups population.
expand_lifetable()
Expand five-year(abridged) life table to one-year(complete) life table.
icdo3to10()
Convert ICDO3 codes to ICD10 code.
line_chart()
Plot line chart
lt()
Calculate life table from mortality rates.
pyramid()
Plot population pyramid
read_canreg()
Read cancer registration data in the format reported to the National Cancer Center.
tidy_address()
Query address code
tidy_age()
Tidy age description.
tidy_occu()
Tidy occupation codes or description.
tidy_sex()
Tidy gender variable

Developed by Qiong Chen.
